System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 700MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
Video card RAM: 16MB
DirectX Version: 8.1 or above
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Zuma's Revenge_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Survive the new world of Zuma in Zuma's Revenge, where evil spirits and tiki bosses rule the land! Conquer over 60 ribbeting levels by firing stone spheres to make matches and destroy the deadly stream of balls. Slide and hop for smarter shots; hit targets for exotic bonuses; detonate power-up balls; battle six imposing tiki bosses and guide your agile amphibian to victory! Will you succumb to the perilous pitfalls of four all new game modes, or can you tame the jungle in the ball-blasting challenge of Zuma's Revenge?
